questions.question: The failure plane in direct shear test is ____.

explanations.a: In a direct shear test, the specimen is subjected to shear stress along a horizontal plane. When the shear stress applied reaches the shear strength of the material being tested, the failure occurs along a horizontal plane within the specimen.
